question: In addition to India, US and Japan, which county will participate in this yearâ€™s Malabar Naval Exercise?
explanation:
India has announced that Australia would participate in the upcoming Malabar Naval Exercise this year, in addition to USA and Japan.
The exercise is expected to take place next month in the Bay of Bengal and the Arabian Sea. The Malabar exercise started in 1992 between Navies of India and USA in the Indian Ocean. Japan became a member from 2015.
